page.title: 20CHILDRENS INTERESTS
page.content: Our class enjoy playing records in their spare time. Favourite pop stars include Midge Ure, Madonna, Bruce Sprintstein, Sister Sledge, Queen and Tina Turner. 'In' things at the moment are training shoes and Kickers and many boys would like Dr Martin boots. Hairstyles include Mohican, crew cuts and streaked and highlighted hair (although nobody has any of these!) . BMX bikes, Walkman stereos and snooker tables are also popular. Many children have hand held electronic games (Manic Miner, Firefox, U-boat) and some have computers, these include Dragon 32, Vic 20, Commodore 64, Spectrum Plus and Acorn Electron. This information was collected by P7M and P7S Duncan Forbes Primary School, Culloden, Inverness.
